name: BORDER
description:
Welcome to the BORDER officer.

The Year is 2084, you have been assigned to a border control. Your mission: make sure the right people go in and the wrong people go out, Do not let anyone wanted cross, you must shoot them on site, no exception, 3 wrong doing and you're done! In between shifts you will be able to purchase upgrade:

Scan_Speed: Decreases the scan time by 10% per purchase. (50% max)

Auto_Scan: Assists you by automatically scanning aimed civilians.

Strikes+: Increases you strike by 1 per purchase. (max 3 strikes)

More_Money: Multiplies the money earned by .2x per purchase. (2x max)

How to play:

LMB: Shoot/Buy

RMB:Scan/Skip Wave/Next Shift

This was a game made for the Bleeding Tapes Game Jam #1 in the space of 2 weeks, so things might be unbalanced, unpolished or buggy. I hope you enjoy!

P.S. I might work on this more sometime, and make it a full game, no promises tho!
